config.category.uiAndVisual.coordinatesD: Set the horizontal position of the coordinates display.
Set the vertical position of the coordinates display.
Adjust the size of the coordinates text.
Adjust the color of the coordinates text using the slider.
Apply a dynamic rainbow effect to the coordinates text.
config.category.uiAndVisual.armorHUD.xPo: Set the horizontal position of the armor HUD.
config.category.uiAndVisual.armorHUD.yPo: Set the vertical position of the armor HUD.
config.category.uiAndVisual.armorHUD.sca: Adjust the size of the armor HUD.
config.category.uiAndVisual.armorHUD.dur: Set the color of the durability bar using the slider.
config.category.uiAndVisual.armorHUD.rai: Apply a dynamic rainbow effect to the durability bar.
config.category.uiAndVisual.xpProgressHU: Adjust the horizontal position of the XP Progress HUD.
Adjust the vertical position of the XP Progress HUD.
Change the size of the XP Progress HUD.
Use the slider to change the color of the XP text.
Applies a dynamic rainbow effect to the XP text.
config.category.uiAndVisual.toolDurabili: Adjust the X position of the tool durability HUD.
Adjust the Y position of the tool durability HUD.
Change the size of the tool durability HUD.
Use the slider to change the color of the durability bar.
Applies a dynamic rainbow effect to the durability bar.
config.category.uiAndVisual.potionEffect: Adjust the X position of the potion effects HUD.
Adjust the Y position of the potion effects HUD.
Change the size of the potion effects HUD.
Use the slider to change the color of the duration text.
Applies a dynamic rainbow effect to the duration text.
Sort the potion effects in alphabetical order (A-Z).
Sort the potion effects in reverse alphabetical order (Z-A).
config.category.uiAndVisual.foodSaturati: Applies a dynamic rainbow effect to the saturation bar.
Use the slider to change the color of the saturation bar.
